name: Overwhelmed (itch)
description:
Those with Executive Function Disorders - such as ADHD and depression - struggle with a disconnect between intent and action.

This short experience attempts to illustrate this disconnect - where the player acts as the characters intent, and the character doesn't simply comply. 

We hope this will help convey the feelings of frustration and helplessness that those with these disorders suffer through everyday.

NOTE: This is an unfinished Work In Progress - but we believe the core ideas are evident in what we have.
